        java.lang.String getPath()
        a path for the toolbox. This should be unique among all loaded toolboxes
        Returns:

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        a type for the toolbox. The type determines which ToolboxLoader can load this Toolbox. It should share its type with the ToolboxLoader that loaded it.
        Returns:
